review: This thing works great.  I own a ROKU which I am happy with also.  The Fire Stick is less expensive and does everything my $89 Roku does plus.The Android app works perfectly with it.  The remote functions great.  It is amazing what this tiny device can do.  I primarily use it with Hulu plus, Netflix, Amazon Prime and Plex.  Happy with all of those apps
